fields.name: Levis Men Green & White Striped Shirt
fields.description: Green and white striped shirt made of 100% cotton, has full sleeves, spread collar with a full front button placket, pocket on the left chest, and a curved hem

fields.name: French Connection Women Black Trousers
fields.description: Black skin tight jeans trousers has two insert pockets on the front with an insert pocket in the right side pocket, two patch pockets at the back, brand badge appliqué d on the waistband at the back, comfortable waistband with loops and a button and zipper closure on the front

fields.name: French Connection Women Faded Black Jeans
fields.description: Faded greyish black, skinny, corduroy jeans trousers has two insert pockets on the front with one coin pocket, two patch pockets at the back, brand badge appliqué  d on the waistband at the back, comfortable waistband with loops and a button and zipper closure on the front

fields.name: French Connection Women Black Jeans

fields.name: French Connection Women Blue Jeans
fields.description: These blue jeans from French Connection are crafted from indigo yarn-dyed fabric which stretches in all directions to fit the body perfectly. Wear this pair with casual tops and heeled sandals to look chic and adorable

fields.name: French Connection Blue & Black Printed Dress
fields.description: Cream dress with black and navy blue print, scoop neck, sleeveless, princess panel with cascade inserts and drawstring with tie ups at waist on the side

fields.name: French Connection Women Blue Dress
fields.description: Cool blue dress with adjustable shoulder straps created by French Connection. You'll look achingly elegant if you pair this with silver or grey stilettos when you're heading out for the evening.

fields.name: French Connection Women Red Dress
fields.description: Shell: 97% cotton, 3% elastane. Lining: 97% cotton, 3% elastane. Dry clean only

fields.name: French Connection Women Black Top
fields.description: Style Note: french connection has got that chic look just right for you this summer with their range of bright and well styled tops. Flattering to your form and easy to compl

fields.description: French connection has got that chic look just right for you this summer with their range of bright and well styled tops. Flattering to your form and easy to compl

fields.name: French Connection Women Brown Top
fields.description: This top from french connection adds a laid back feel to your off-duty look. The oversized, slouchy silhouette offered by this top looks best styled with leggings

fields.name: French Connection Women Maroon Top
fields.description: French connection has got that chic look just right for you this summer with their range of bright and well styled tops. Flattering to your form and easy to compl

fields.name: Spice Art Women Grey & Black Handbag
fields.description: We like the ability of Spice Art to get traditional art forms to complement modern elements to offer an ethnic yet contemporary product that you will want to show off. Beautifully done and designed by skilled craftsmen, these handbags will definitely win you a few compliments.

fields.name: Spice Art Women White Handbag
fields.description: We like the ability of Spice Art to get traditional art forms to complement modern elements to offer an ethnic yet contemporary product that you will want to show off. Beautifully done and designed by skilled craftsmen, these handbags will definitely win you a few compliments.

fields.name: Spice Art Women Black Handbag
fields.description: Beautifully done and designed by skilled craftsmen, these handbags will definitely win you a few compliments. Carry them in style with your ethnic outfit to a family function and impress or style them carefully with a western outfit for a jazzed up look

fields.name: Spice Art Women Red Handbag
fields.description: Beautifully done and designed by skilled craftsmen, these handbags will definitely win you a few compliments.

fields.name: Catwalk Women Brown Heels
fields.description: Created for the woman of sophistication, this sandal from catwalk is crafted with high quality synthetic leather to offer unparalleled comfort and is uniquely designed to give your feet that urban touche.

fields.name: Catwalk Women Bronze Heels
fields.description: Updated Roman sandals have never looked this good. These black sandals with bronze straps from catwalk are versatile enough to go with everything: from jeans, to shorts and skirts.

fields.name: Catwalk Women Beige Flats
fields.description: A perfect addition to your daily wardrobe, this sandal from catwalk is crafted from durable material with fashionable cutouts to offer exemplary comfort without compromising on style.

fields.name: Catwalk Women Black Flats
fields.description: Get dressed in these sandals from catwalk for a glammed up look. The synthetic straps with the gold edges lends a dose of sophisticated style to your look, making this pair a must have in your wardrobe.

fields.name: Mayhem Women Gradiant Sunglasses MAYS-9007-202
fields.description: This pair of modish sunglasses will surely add style and charm to your look. Team it with your favourite casual attire for a dashing look.

fields.name: Mayhem Women Gradient Sunglasses MAYS-9005-201
fields.description: This pair of modish sunglasses will surely add style and charm to your look. Team it with your favourite casual attire for a dashing look.

fields.name: M tv Women My Fab Eyewear Brown Sunglasses
fields.description: Hot, hip and happening - brand MTV has caught the nerve of the new generation like no other. This MTV eyewear is desgned to make one stand out in a crowd and is fashioned to dress those who wear their appetite to win up their sleeves.

fields.name: United Colors of Benetton Women Sunglass
fields.description: An essential for these Summer months, these chic yet practical sunglasses from United Colors of Benetton make for a great buy. Designed to reduce daylight glare and and to protect you from the harmful rays of the sun

fields.name: DKNY Women White Dial Watch NY3715
fields.description: This classic watch from DKNY will reflect your exquisite style and charisma. Don it with an evening dress or formals to dazzle wherever you go.

fields.name: DKNY Women White Dial Watch NY4609
fields.description: Case style: Analogue watch with rectangular case, a stainless steel back and a fixed bezellt. Dial style: White dial with markings and three hands to mark hours, minutes and seconds

fields.name: DKNY Women Black Dial Watch NY4620
fields.description: Features: A screw to reset time. Strap style: Silver-toned bracelet-style strap secured with a tang clasp. Water-resistant. Comes in a signature DKNY case. Warranty: 2 year international warranty against manufacturing defects from the date of purchase

fields.name: DKNY Women White Dial Watch NY4634
fields.description: This classic watch from DKNY will reflect your exquisite style and charisma. Don it with an evening dress or formals to dazzle wherever you go.

fields.name: Deborah Pink Light Creator Shine Volume 9 Lipstick
fields.description: Shine and Volume Light Creator lipstick from Deborah for a creamy wet shine. One swipe and you're good to go!

fields.name: Deborah Shine Tech Ruibes Nail Polish 34
fields.description: Shine Tech from Deborah uses the brand's patented technology to prevent quick chipping and long-lasting shine. Don't you want to indulge those nails with this lovely shade?

fields.name: Deborah Hazel Euphoric Shine 13 Lip Gloss
fields.description: Euphoric Shine from Deborah contains Euphoryl 3 and blue poppy extract to keep your lips glossy and soft with its use. The lustrous shine on its use is truly one of a kind. The brand recommends applying a base lip pencil outline of the same shade as the gloss for long lasting effects.

fields.name: Deborah Euphoric Shine 14 Lip Gloss
fields.description: Enriched with patented shine pearls, Vitamin B and E for a glossy finish. Ultra-soft applicator

fields.name: Deborah Mat Sense Tech Black Nail Polish 03
fields.description: Sense Touch from Deborah gives your nails that lovely satin-matte finish that ordinary products won't. The brand recommends usage on bare nails without a base coat, top coat, drying drops or hand lotion.

fields.name: Deborah Sense Tech Mat Green Nail Polish 04
fields.description: Sense Tech from Deborah uses the brand's patented technology to prevent quick chipping and long-lasting shine. Don't you want to indulge those nails with this lovely shade?

fields.name: Deborah 7 Days Long Violet Nail Polish 831
fields.description: Ultra long lasting nail polish with anti-chipping properties. Has anti-shock properties.

fields.name: Spice Art Women Leatherette  Black Handbag
fields.description: Created for the woman of sophistication, this handbag from spice art is crafted from the finest material and in fashionable designs to give you that stylish edge.

fields.name: Mother Earth Women Orange Printed Kurta
fields.description: Orange printed round neck kurta made of blended cotton fabric, has pin tucks on the yoke, mock buttoned placket, drawstrings at the midriff, three quarter sleeves and a vented hemline.

fields.name: Mother Earth Women Off white Kurta
fields.description: The inspiration for this kurta from mother earth is the retro-esque fusion of ethnic apparel and smart workwear. This piece epitomizes how fashion, vintage styling and comfort unite to create the perfect Indian tunic.

fields.name: Mother Earth Women Pink Printed Kurta
fields.description: Pink and cream printed round neck kurta made of blended cotton fabric, has a split neck line, pin tucks on the shoulder, metallic detail on the yoke, three quarter sleeves and a vented hemline.

fields.name: Mother Earth Women Maroon Kurta
fields.description: Maroon printed V-neck kurta made of blended cotton fabric, has embroidery on the yoke with piping on the seams, three quarter sleeves and a vented hemline.

fields.name: Scullers Women Check Black Shirt
fields.description: Black and white plaid check shirt made of 100% cotton, has a spread collar, full length buttoned placket, short sleeves with foldover buttoned flaps , and a curved hemline

fields.name: Spice Art Women Leatherette Green Handbags
fields.description: Made of synthetic leather in turtle shell pattern and is ruched near the mouth. Wide handles with rose embellishments on the front

fields.name: Lucera Women Gold Pendant and Chain
fields.description: Lucera or Luminous star in Spanish, is designed for fashionistas who like to shine! Lucera fashion jewellery offers contemporary designs to complement the various moods of the modern and fashion conscious woman of today. This chain and pendant sets are a must have for every woman who believes in dressing up in elegance.

fields.name: Highlander Men Check Maroon Slim Fit Shirt
fields.description: Maroon, blue and white check shirt made of 100% cotton, has full sleeves with buttoned cuffs, spread collar, front buttoned placket, patch pocket on the left chest with embroidered brand logo and a curved hem

fields.name: Highlander Men Stripes White Shirt
fields.description: White shirt with red and navy blue pinstripes, made of 100% cotton, has full sleeves with buttoned cuffs, spread collar, front buttoned placket, patch pocket on the left chest with embroidered brand logo and a curved hem

fields.name: Probase Men Stripes White Shirt
fields.description: White shirt made of 100% cotton, has a black pinstriped yoke extending to the spread collar, full sleeves with buttoned cuffs, full length buttoned placket, and a curved hemline

fields.name: Arrow Men Stripes Blue Shirts
fields.description: Blue shirt with white stripes, made of 100% cotton, engineered with Autopress Gold quality, has a tipped collar with a buttoned front placket, full sleeves with buttoned cuffs, SPI 16 on the shoulders, patch pocket on the left chest, box pleat at the back and a tailed hem

fields.name: Locomotive Men Washed Blue Jeans
fields.description: Indigo jeans made of 100% cotton, has pockets on the sides with a patch pocket inside the right one and embroidered branding inside the left one, two pockets at the back with heavy embroidery and a patch pocket above the right one, a looped waist with brand embroidery on the fabric inseam of the back waist, button and zipper closure on the front, and contrast colour stitch detailing

fields.name: Locomotive Men Washed Blue Jeans
fields.description: Navy blue jeans made of 100% cotton, has pockets on the sides with a patch pocket inside the right one, two pockets at the back, a looped waist, and a button and zipper closure on the front

fields.name: Locomotive Men Washed Blue Jeans
fields.description: Durable, versatile, uniquely designed and reasonably priced, this washed semi boot cut jeans from locomotive is designed for the man with an impressive high fashion casual attitude. Crafted from durable cotton fabric, this denim trouser is here to stay and offer exemplary comfort for years on end.

fields.name: Locomotive Men Washed Blue Jeans
fields.description: Crafted from durable cotton fabric, this denim trouser is here to stay and offer exemplary comfort for years on end. Pair it with semi-formal shirts or t-shirts, and sneakers.

fields.name: Numero Uno Men Casual Brown Slipper
fields.description: A reinterpretation of a classic style, this numero uno slipper is a fashion must-have. Style your look to perfection with these excellently designed slippers that ensure comfort and reflect an easy-going attitude.

fields.name: Turtle Men Black Belt
fields.description: Wipe surface with a clean, dry cloth to remove dust. Use a leather conditioner to maintain belt quality if necessary if necessary

fields.name: Enroute Men Leather Tan Formal Shoes
fields.description: Indulge in the luxury of pure leather with this pair of shoes from enroute. In a classic silhouette and with ample cushioning, this casual oxford makes for a fabulous addition to your wardrobe.

fields.name: ADIDAS Originals Unisex Black Dial Chronograph Watch ADH2571
fields.description: Taking traditional designs and giving it a modern twist is what makes this Adidas original watch a classic timepiece. Team it with your casual outfits to add that tinge of sophistication.
